snippet: Dr. Casscells, a successful cardiologist, stunned those who knew him when he joined the Army Reserve at age 54 and volunteered to go to Iraq.
abstract: Dr S Ward Casscells, Pentagon's top medical officer, dies at age 60.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Casscells, a successful cardiologist, stunned those who knew him when he joined the Army Reserve at age 54 and volunteered to go to Iraq.
